page.title: 01ABBOTS BROMLEY
page.content: {ABBOTS BROMLEY}is the main residential area in this block. Old houses line the long village street, with new housing developments behind them. Abbots Bromley is famous for{THE {HORN DANCE.}The village was a thriving market town but the railway bypassed it and it is now a large village. The whole landscape is an intensively farmed dairy area with some remnants of the {NEEDWOOD FOREST. Part of Blithfield Reservoir is in this block. Abbots Bromley is within easy reach of Uttoxeter, Rugeley, Burton-on-Trent, Stafford and Lichfield. Farming is the main occupation with other people travelling to work in nearby towns.
